changeSet.author: user
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE if not exists public.bond_payout_master ( id serial PRIMARY key, payout_date date NOT null, isin varchar(100) NOT null, listed varchar(20), issuer_name varchar(200) NOT null, face_value decimal, interest_amt decimal, total_amt decimal, remarks text, UNIQUE (isin, payout_date) );
